meanings.definition: A person who restricts or limits something.
meanings.sent1: The stinter at the party only allowed one piece of cake per person.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was known as the classroom stinter, always enforcing strict rules.
meanings.sent3: The stinter of fun decided that the game could only be played for five minutes.
meanings.sent4: She was a stinter of compliments, rarely praising anyone.
meanings.sent5: The stinter of time made sure everyone left the meeting promptly.

meanings.sent1: The company decided to stinter the budget for the project.
meanings.sent2: Parents often stinter screen time to ensure their children have a balance.
meanings.sent3: I will stinter my chocolate intake to avoid gaining weight.
meanings.sent4: The new regulations will stinter the use of plastic bags in the city.
meanings.sent5: She had to stinter her social media usage to focus on her studies.
